sentences.sentence: I prepared filet mignon for dinner.
sentences.translation: 晚餐我打算做菲力牛排。

sentences.sentence: Wow! Filet Mignon! Peking Duck! Lobster!
sentences.translation: 哇！腓力牛排！北京烤鸭！龙虾！

sentences.sentence: Billy: Wow! Filet Mignon! Peking Duck! Lobster!
sentences.translation: 比利︰哇！菲力牛排！北京烤鸭！龙虾！
